synopsis.text:
High schooler Lim Jugyeong, once a target of bullies due to her plain appearance, discovers the power of makeup to transform her image. After perfecting her skills through online tutorials, she transfers to Saebom High School, known for its tradition of selecting a school goddess who is then scouted by entertainment agencies. Jugyeong quickly becomes a contender for the title, drawing attention from both admirers and rivals, including the two-time goddess Sujin, who harbors a hidden agenda to take Jugyeong down.

Determined not to be a victim again, Jugyeong engages in a fierce competition while keeping her makeup-free face a secret. But when the popular Suho Lee accidentally sees her bare face, and the mysterious SeoJun Han becomes suspicious of her true identity, Jugyeong's life becomes more complicated. As she navigates the challenges of maintaining her image and dealing with unexpected relationships, Jugyeong embarks on a journey of self-discovery, questioning the true meaning of beauty.

Will Jugyeong emerge victorious in the ruthless world of beauty and popularity, or will she succumb to the pressures? Join Jugyeong in 'True Beauty' as she explores the complexities of beauty, identity, and love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
